Title: Login with valid credentials
Preconditions: User is on the Login page
Steps: 1) Enter a valid username 2) Enter the correct password 3) Click Login
Expected: Login succeeds and Inventory page is displayed

Title: Login with empty username
Preconditions: User is on the Login page
Steps: 1) Leave username empty 2) Enter any password 3) Click Login
Expected: Error message is displayed and user remains on Login page

Title: Login with empty password
Preconditions: User is on the Login page
Steps: 1) Enter any username 2) Leave password empty 3) Click Login
Expected: Error message is displayed and user remains on Login page

Title: Login with empty username and password
Preconditions: User is on the Login page
Steps: 1) Leave username empty 2) Leave password empty 3) Click Login
Expected: Error message is displayed and user remains on Login page

Title: Login with invalid credentials
Preconditions: User is on the Login page
Steps: 1) Enter an invalid username 2) Enter an invalid password 3) Click Login
Expected: Error message is displayed and user remains on Login page

Title: Logout from the application
Preconditions: User is logged in on the Inventory page
Expected: User is logged out and Login page is displayed

Title: Access Inventory URL while logged out
Steps: 1) Open the Inventory page URL directly
Expected: User is redirected to Login page (or access is blocked)
